TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event. It uses the SelectionChangedEventArgs to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
[!code-xml[ListBoxEvent#8](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml#8)]
[!code-cs[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ListBox_VB/Pane1.xaml.vb#9)]

Docs.param: The items that were unselected during this event.
The items that were selected during this event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event. It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
[!code-xml[ListBoxEvent#8](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml#8)]
[!code-cs[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ListBox_VB/Pane1.xaml.vb#9)]

Docs.summary: Gets a list that contains the items that were selected.
Docs.value: The items that were selected since the last time the event occurred.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event. It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
[!code-xml[ListBoxEvent#8](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml#8)]
[!code-cs[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListBoxEvent/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#9](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ListBox_VB/Pane1.xaml.vb#9)]

Docs.summary: Gets a list that contains the items that were unselected.
Docs.value: The items that were unselected since the last time the event occurred.
